com.jpl.nasa.scihound

Class AggregatedPointInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jpl.nasa.scihound.AggregatedPointInformation

  • public class AggregatedPointInformation
extends java.lang.Object
    Collected Points Information: Point's location data, photo file path, DateTime, etc. There will be one instance of this class for each project. Instances of this class are held in ProjectToPoints to allow users to have multiple projects at one time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> allAccuracy
      The point's accuracy (in horizontal radial distance in meters) information.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> allHeading
      The point's bearing from true north in the interval (0.0, 360.0].
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> allLatitudes
      The point's latitude information.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> allLongitudes
      The point's longitude information.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commentItems
      The point's comment that the user sets.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> emailClass
      The point's land cover class that is sent via the email intent.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> emailDateTime
      The point's date and time information that will be sent via the email intent.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> GUID
      The Global Unique Identifier that will ensure that each point has a unique ID.
      int iid
      We iterate IID to show on the interface a unique name for each collected point.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> listItems
      The point's land cover class that is visualized through the ListView element.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> photoExists
      The boolean information to see if the user took a picture of the point collected.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> photoFilename
      The file path in the external storage of the android phone where will store the captured photo.
      java.lang.String projectType
      The type of project that the points are associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • deletePoint

        public void deletePoint(int position)
        Making the deletion consistent with the data stored. We're removing a single point from the aggregated points.
        Parameters:
        position - The list item's position that is being deleted.

      • clearAllPoints

        public void clearAllPoints()
        Clear the aggregated points after submitting through email intent. Called when the user wants to remove all of the points, after sending the email.
